name: Predator, Meet the Prey (I caught feelings for an online predator)
name_original: Predator, Meet the Prey (I caught feelings for an online predator)
description:
This story comes from a California girl living in East LA- a tall girl in her sophomore year with dark brown hair, and a passion for making dresses. She told me this story a while back and I asked her, "Hey, can I use that crazy story for my game?" (Psst~ "Most of the stories in the app are about my friends. Feel free to submit your stories to my Email as well.") Fast forward to now, and she said "Yes." I can tell her story. 

     Remember, only one path is true. The other outcomes are made up by me, and the things she wished she had done differently. This is her naked truth, so please respect it. And of course have fun on this crazy journey. For obvious reasons, she'd like to stay anonymous. Our story contains no real names or identities, so without further ado, let's see if you end up going down the same path as her, or if you can make better or worse decisions. Now this is your experience.
